snippet.title: Desert search for missing man
snippet.content: A LAND search and rescue operation is currently underway in the Pilbara for a missing man. Police say the man has gone missing along the Canning Stock Route near Lake Disappointment. "Police are appealing for anyone travelling on the Canning Stock Route near Well 22 who might have seen or picked up a man to contact police immediately," a police spokesperson said. The missing man is described as being fair skinned, roughly 185cm tall, of a medium build and with blonde hair.
